title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When invoking the New Java Package Wizard and not entering any text in the package name field, a message appears at the top saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists'.
EB: The New Package Wizard should not display a message when the package name field is empty and the 'Finish' button should be disabled.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the New Package Wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Observe the message at the top of the wizard.
